prompt: You are an autonomous coding agent completing STORY-13: Next.js Public Pages for Itqan CMS. Build article listing and detail pages that consume Strapi GraphQL API with proper SEO, i18n support, and responsive design.
objectives: Create article listing page with pagination and filtering
Build article detail pages with dynamic routing
Implement proper SEO meta tags and structured data
Add bilingual support with locale switching
tasks: Set up Next.js i18n configuration for EN/AR locales
Configure GraphQL client (Apollo/urql) to connect to Strapi
Create article listing page (/articles) with pagination
Add category and tag filtering to article listings
Implement SEO components with meta tags and Open Graph
Create responsive layout with RTL support for Arabic
Add locale switcher and test bilingual navigation
Implement ISR (Incremental Static Regeneration) for performance
guard_rails: All pages must be server-side rendered for SEO
Images must be optimized using Next.js Image component
Arabic content must display properly with RTL layout
All external links should be secure and validated
Error boundaries should handle API failures gracefully
acceptance_criteria: Given I visit /articles, then I see paginated list of published articles
Given I click an article title, then I navigate to full article page
Given I switch language, then content and layout adapt correctly
Article pages have proper meta tags for social media sharing
Site works responsively on mobile, tablet, and desktop
Arabic articles display with proper RTL text direction
definition_of_done: Article listing and detail pages fully functional
SEO optimization verified with meta tag checker
Bilingual functionality tested with real content
Responsive design verified across device sizes
Performance optimized with ISR and image optimization
references: Screen PUB-001: Article listing page with pagination and filters
Screen PUB-002: Article detail page with SEO and social sharing
